mergewith.subtemplate:
<input spec="beast.evolution.tree.birthdeath.BackwardsSchedule" id="catastropheSchedule.t:$(n)" value="0.0" />
<input spec="beast.evolution.tree.birthdeath.BackwardsPointProcess" id="occurrenceTimes.t:$(n)" value="0.0 0.1" />
<distribution id="TimTam.t:$(n)" spec="beast.evolution.speciation.TimTam" mu="1.0" p="0.5" omega="0.5" rootLength="0.2445398" catastropheTimes="@catastropheSchedule.t:$(n)" points="@occurrenceTimes.t:$(n)" tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'> <lambda spec='parameter.RealParameter' id="birthRate.t:$(n)" value='1.0' lower='0' upper='100' /> <psi spec='parameter.RealParameter' id="samplingRate.t:$(n)" value='0.5' lower='0' upper='100' /> </distribution>
<prior id='birthRatePrior.t:$(n)' x='@birthRate.t:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.math.distributions.Uniform" lower='0' upper='100'/></prior> <prior id='samplingRatePrior.t:$(n)' x='@samplingRate.t:$(n)'><distr spec="beast.math.distributions.Uniform" lower='0' upper='100'/></prior>
<scale id='birthRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@birthRate.t:$(n)"/> <scale id='samplingRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@samplingRate.t:$(n)"/>
<scale id='birthRateUpDownOperator.t:$(n)' spec='UpDownOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" up="@birthRate.t:$(n)" down="@Tree.t:$(n)" />
<input spec="beast.evolution.speciation.TimTamLogger" id="TimTamLogger.t:$(n)" />
TimTam prior on tree t:$(n)
birth rate of the TimTam model on partition t:$(n)
sampling rate of the TimTam model on partition t:$(n)
Scale birth rate of TimTam prior of tree t:$(n)
Scale sampling rate of TimTam prior of tree t:$(n)
